meanings.definition: A substance or device used to remove minerals from water.
meanings.sent1: The demineralizers in the water filter help make the water safe to drink.
meanings.sent2: The demineralizers are essential for purifying the water in the laboratory.
meanings.sent3: The demineralizers in the kitchen were like little wizards making the water crystal clear.
meanings.sent4: She saw the demineralizers as tiny miners digging out impurities from the water.
meanings.sent5: The demineralizers worked silently but effectively, transforming the water into a pure liquid.

meanings.definition: A person or company that specializes in the process of demineralizing water.
meanings.sent1: The demineralizers arrived promptly to set up the equipment for water purification.
meanings.sent2: The demineralizers provided expert advice on maintaining the water treatment system.
meanings.sent3: The demineralizers at the company picnic were the ones who made the water taste so good.
meanings.sent4: He thought of himself as a demineralizer, cleansing the water of impurities with precision.
meanings.sent5: The demineralizers' dedication to their work was evident in the quality of the purified water.
